#summary &egrave character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesE

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &egrave

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Egrave;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c8/index.htm U+000C8].
  * `&Egrave` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c8/index.htm U+000C8].
  * `&egrave;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e8/index.htm U+000E8].
  * `&egrave` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e8/index.htm U+000E8].
